Free cancellation available

Up to 24 hours before the start time

Duration: 2 hours

This experience will allow you to explore Madame Tussauds London, which features numerous wax sculptures of celebrities and historical figures. While inside, you'll have the chance to take photos with the museum's incredibly detailed statues, including members of the British royal family.

Additionally, your ticket will include access to the Star Wars Experience, an exhibition where you will have the opportunity to revisit some of the most famous scenes from the film series.

## Why Visit

- Opportunity to snap selfies with favorite celebrities
- 14 interactive zones, including the Star Wars Experience
- Chance to pose with wax sculptures of the British royal family

## What's included

- Admission to Madame Tussauds London
- Admission to the Star Wars Experience

### Restrictions

- Children under 16 need to be accompanied by an adult.


### Additional information

Please note that alterations to Madame Tussauds London's displays are possible without prior notice.

Madame Tussauds is a fully interactive experience where you are allowed to touch the figures.

Cameras and photography are allowed in all areas of Madame Tussauds.

Please note that eating and drinking are not allowed inside the venue.

Pushchairs and similar child carriages must be left at the entrance and can be collected upon exit.

### Frequently asked questions

#### How do I book a ticket?

- Select a date and time.

- Choose the number of tickets.

- Click to the next page and enter your personal details.

- After entering your personal details, select your payment method and enter your payment details.

- Once you’ve entered your payment details, you’ll be redirected to the ticket page where you can check the status and details of your reservations.

- You'll receive a confirmation email once the reservation is confirmed with the attraction operator. This could take some time depending on the supplier.

- You can view your tickets in the confirmation email or in the Bookings & Trips section of your account.


* * *

#### When do I pay?

Booking.com collects payment on behalf of the attraction operator when you book your ticket.

* * *

#### How do digital tickets work?

Each digital ticket contains a unique code. This is usually a QR or numerical code, but could be something else and can be found on your ticket or the PDF sent to you.

If your digital ticket contains a barcode or QR code, show it to the staff at the attraction's entrance or ticket collection point for them to scan.

For those with numerical codes, show your ticket to staff for verification.

* * *

#### Can I cancel or modify my tickets?

You’ll need to check the policy on the specific ticket you book. Last-minute bookings might not have free cancellation available.

* * *

#### When will I get my free cancellation refund?

After you cancel, we'll issue a full refund immediately. Depending on your bank or payment provider, it can take 3–10 days to be refunded to your original payment method.

metadata.og:description: Madame Tussauds London admission that includes access to the Star Wars™ Experience
metadata.title: Admission to Madame Tussauds London London – Booking.com
metadata.ogDescription: Madame Tussauds London admission that includes access to the Star Wars™ Experience

Why visit: Opportunity to snap selfies with favorite celebrities
14 interactive zones, including the Star Wars Experience
Chance to pose with wax sculptures of the British royal family
What included: Admission to the Star Wars Experience
Restrictions: Children under 16 need to be accompanied by an adult.
Location: Madame Tussauds, 18 Marylebone Road, London, NW1 5LQ
additional Information: Alterations to Madame Tussauds London's displays are possible without prior notice.
Cameras and photography are allowed in all areas of Madame Tussauds.
Eating and drinking are not allowed inside the venue.
Pushchairs and similar child carriages must be left at the entrance.
